title: Wall Street Breakfast, April 12th: First Quarter Earnings Looms, GE Considers Its Options
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Today’s top stories: markets look to be tested as trader’s assess first quarter results; the Fed expects a strengthening economy and rising inflation; and GE is exploring an IPO to avoid higher taxes. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
